name: Let's Get This Bread (BananaHoshi)
description:
In an ever changing world, you only have a limited amount of time. Each and every second in this lifetime must be used properly, with your end goal always in sight. That end goal being to GET THAT BREAD!

...to make the worlds most perfect sandwich. 

Navigate the town to accumulate resources to create your perfect sandwich, at each age you'll gain and lose new abilities, and the townspeople's opinions will change all the while.  Tactfully age up, and keep in mind that though you can go forward in time, you can never go back.
